DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to determine whether a group of resident physicians otherwise naïve to robotic surgery can demonstrate equal levels of proficiency during their first robotic supracervical hysterectomy having received training either with the Mimic dV-Trainer or the daVinci Skills Simulator.
DOC.brief_title: Non-inferiority Study Comparing daVinci Skills Simulator to Mimic dV-Trainer for Preparing Residents to Perform Live Human Surgery
DOC.criteria: Obstetrics and gynecology or general surgery residents in ACGME accredited programs naïve to robotic surgery training Completion of the online orientation to daVinci Surgical System Performance of any robotic surgical procedures as the console surgeon Performance of any robotic simulator protocols Any significant amount of time spent on a virtual reality robotic simulator
